title: Creates the crime of possession of a gambling device in the first degree
summary: Creates the crime of possession of a gambling device in the first degree which prohibits the manufacture, sale, transport, placement or possession of five or more slot machines, other gambling device or a coin operated gambling device; possession of a gambling device in the first degree is a class E felony; also includes within the offense of promoting gambling the receiving of more than $5000 in any one day from unlawful gambling activities.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to possession of gambling devices and promoting certain gambling activities
